about_the_game:
Mayday is an exciting open-world survival game. After a mysterious accident, you find yourself on a desert island and must find ways to survive. Collect resources, craft tools and evolve to protect yourself from the dangers of this enigmatic place. Hunt, fish, create a farm with the island's animals to ensure a constant supply of food. Explore an archipelago full of unique islands and discover their secrets.





Explore: Explore different biomes and find unique resources that will expand your way of surviving. Plains, beaches, swamps, ruins, deserts, cemeteries and caves are some of the environments you'll find as you explore the islands of this place.



Treasure: Find hidden treasures scattered around the islands. These treasures will help you survive and thrive on your journey. Each treasure discovered is another step in your survival adventure.



Magic Totems: Discover magical totems that unlock essential upgrades to improve your skills. By interacting with these totems, you can improve your exploration, combat and survival skills, making you better equipped to face the challenges and mysteries that this enigmatic island hides.



Mysteries: Try to unravel the mystery that brought you to this island. Explore and understand the events that take place here. Dive deep into this journey, realizing that it goes beyond simply resolving apparent conflicts. This adventure can turn into a journey of discovery and self-knowledge, revealing your deepest feelings.
